title: WOW JUST WOW THE NEW LOGIN FOR JIHN WOW
body:
WOW RIOT really this is amazing i love orchestra music ( i dont know if it i) but wow this is amazing i have the hardest time looking for music like this and you provided an amazing piece
thank you it is now one of my faves its just so beatiful that i wouldnt log in just to hear this all day 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pYm4kDz_P1g

replies.body: Thanks so much, kemlordchaos! Glad you're enjoying this!
I love how the entire music is made out of violins and gun shots.
Sounds like something I would hear from the soundtrack of 300
